storyInfo: Outsiders have infiltrated Wolumonde to incite a rebellion. With Rhodes Island's help, the rebellion is temporarily quelled. To try to ease tensions between the two sides, Tatjana decides to take them both to the medical point set up by Atro for investigation.

attributes.content: —When did they appear?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I'm not sure. But the 'Gramophone' didn't start...
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: I told you before not to rely on those experimental automatic Arts devices.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: If they have some educated Leithaniens in that Infected group, they could have easily turned a machine against us.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Too late for that. The Infected quarter is crawling with them. They're whipping them up.
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: ...The people here should be above that kind of provocation.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: B-but there are more and more protesters every day. They're gathering up and—
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: What are their demands?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: They want us to start supplying Zwölftontechnik Strasse again... and they want all quarantine measures on Zwölftontechnik Strasse lifted.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: ...Nonsense.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Of course, their main demand is that we give an appropriate response to the fire...
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: They don't give a rat's ass about the fire. Just you wait, everyone will forget what this was about soon enough.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: What should we do? Rhodes Island is already here. It's only a matter of time before they find out.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: We all know that. Why do you think I sent Tatjana with them?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Before we lay it all out for Rhodes Island, we have to be sure what kind of company they are. We have to know if they're Atro's kind of Infected, or 'the other' kind.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I'm not sure that's right... Won't things just get worse once they find out on their own what we're hiding?
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Ha... Think what you will. If they're the type to turn the other cheek, that's what they'll do. You and I both know what's going on here in Wolumonde.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I know, but—
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: —Then don't try to play the good guy here. Things don't work out for the good guys. We need to focus on outcomes.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: *Cough* *cough*... What about the real nasty ones? Like the devils?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: They haven't made formal contact yet...
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: They're a bunch of vultures, stirring up our people, looking to divide and conquer. How trite of them.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: They're playing it cool, probing our defenses. When they're sure there's no Gendarmerie garrisoned in Wolumonde...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Everyone here is ready to fight. And we have the L-44 'Gramophone' defense system.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: But you're not Gendarmerie... *Sigh*, I'm just trying not to get anyone killed, *cough*— *cough* *cough* *hack*—
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Take care of yourself. Wolumonde can't afford to lose you.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Really? I don't think it makes much difference...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Who else could keep Wolumonde's defenses up without a single Gendarmerie?
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: It's just stubborn blood. Leithanien nobles won't stoop to doing their own dirty work. Give them one more push and you'll see this place go to hell in a handbasket.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: If we don't come up with something soon, this game is over.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: We have to get back on our normal course before winter. Stay stuck in this wasteland and watch starvation and rioting destroy the town.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Maybe... Yes, you're right.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: It's already getting cold, *cough*—
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: ...I hope Wolumonde still has other options.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Hey! Where are you two from?!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Are you here to help those morons keep us locked up in here to die?!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Know your place!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Who were you talking to just now? What did you tell him?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Hah. You scared? You should be!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: It's because you bureaucrats can't do shit that Wolumonde is in this mess!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Why don't you let us try running the show for a while?!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: This isn't anyone's fault!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: You're just gonna call it a Catastrophe and be done with it?! It's your fault we couldn't steer away from it in the first place!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: ...You're begging for a fight, Infected.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Have you been to any other cities? Have you seen how other Infected live?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Even I can see that Wolumonde is in a crisis, but the non-infected are going through the same tough times as you Infected. Shouldn't you be working together to get through this?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Huh? And who the hell are you?
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: I'm a Rhodes Island Operator, an Infected doctor. We help the Infected through crises, as long as they're not stirring up trouble for no reason.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: G-good day. C-could you please stop resisting...?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Pfah! You're here to kick us around. If I let you, that is—!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: You want us to work together? Why don't you ask the woman who started all this?
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: That...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Hey, you. You're infected, aren't you?
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Nine-tailed Vulpos are pretty rare. Sooner or later, you'll end up just like us.
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: I don't think so... Everyone's so nice to me...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: For now. But that won't last forever. Maybe not today, maybe not tomorrow, but soon enough.
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: If only Dr. Atro was here...
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Hey! What are you doing?! Let go!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: What did you just say?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Folinic, calm down!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Did you just say 'Dr. Atro?'
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Where is she? Is she alright?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: What do you mean where is she? The fire took everything from us!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: They've been pushing us out since the Great Rift appeared. They're terrified!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: They even rounded up the Infected who came here seeking refuge! Why? Because they have to control us, to lock us up like animals, all to satisfy their twisted idea of humanism!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: That's not true... the Schultz isn't like that!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Feh. Whatever. If that's all it was, we'd be fine too...
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: At least we had Dr. Atro. At least we had each other. Even if we lost this quarter, we at least had a place to stay...
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: But they... they killed Dr. Atro, and our friends!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Because of that fire!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: ...Wh-what do you want?
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: ...Atro should have survived that fire.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Oh, I get it. They lied to you. Of course. They lie to everyone.
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: It wasn't an accident. It was arson. It was murder. It was self-righteous moralizers showing their true colors.
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: I'm not your therapist. Let's cool the emotional venting—
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Heh. You know what they didn't tell you?
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Wait, stop!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: ...The day that fire happened, not a single person made it out of that tent!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: You mean...?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I think you know whose side you should be on.
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Enough.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Gah! Take it easy already!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: ...Behave yourself. You're under arrest.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: You're no Gendarmerie! None of you are! There's no law here! All we got is leftovers from the settlers!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: The Schultz will decide your fate. I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Hmph. You wouldn't dare kill me. You wouldn't risk a mass Infected uprising!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: I guess I'll just wait for you to exile me to the wasteland so I can join up with the—
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: ...You and your friends are convinced that we are the ones behind all this.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: But we're all fellow citizens of Wolumonde, and we're all a part of this town together. We've lived in peace for so many years—
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Why would you trust some the word of some strange outsiders over ours?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: What have we done wrong?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: ...Because you are not one of the Winterwisp. Nor are you Infected. You're just a sheltered little girl.
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: You forget what it means to be Infected. You forget what Oripathy is. I know better than you. It's that simple.
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Here! Tatjana is here!
attributes.name: Militiaman

attributes.content: And Rhodes Island! Are you two okay?
attributes.name: Militiaman

attributes.content: Yes, we're fine!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Take them away, please.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Ugh. I have to see Severin again...
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: We'll make sure they don't do anything else. But Miss Tatjana, what of the two from Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Militiaman

attributes.content: I will take care of them.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Very well. Then, we'll go on ahead.
attributes.name: Militiaman

attributes.content: Now can you give me an explanation?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Miss Folinic...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I... I will tell you everything.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: I don't know what Schultz Severin and the councilors are thinking. But I believe... Miss Folinic and Miss Suzuran, I believe you deserve to know the truth.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Considering how you just helped me...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: You're wasting time. I just want to know... is she alive?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I... I don't know...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: You don't know?!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Please, Miss Folinic.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Miss Tatjana... why are you lying to me?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: None of us are really ready to accept it ourselves.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Please understand, we don't know what Rhodes Island is like. We had to be sure we could trust—
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Even if we were ruthless, cold-blooded corporate raiders out to make everything worse for Wolumonde, that's no excuse for you to deceive our people!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I'm sorry... I really am...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: We were planning to tell you the truth...! We, we've been doing everything we can to investigate the Infected outside the town!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: But I know. I know that's all just for our own sake. It's no excuse...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Exactly right. You're making excuses. But... it's fine.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: All I want... is the truth. Rhodes Island won't abandon you. We wouldn't look past a town suffering a crisis like this.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: That would make Atro very unhappy. She's such a baby whenever she gets sad. And I hate seeing her cry.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: It's not too late. For either of us.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Helping the Infected and solving their problems is what being a Rhodes Island Operator is all about.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Miss Tatjana, there's so much we can do if we just trust each other!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Before the Catastrophe, the Schultz asked Dr. Atro if she would leave with the refugees...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Dr. Atro said the same thing—'Rhodes Island won't abandon you.'
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Please come with me.
attributes.name: Tatjana
